trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Indio
There were no other sightings in Indio on or around October 20th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was driving when i seen two objects east hovering,i stopped at my moms ,to get a better view and involve more witness. at first it looked like party balloons,but balloons don't gain altitude in a straight path 40ft away from one another,hovering east then slowly changing direction, when it was just about over us, object # 1 suddenly engages in a c type maneuver and takes off fast, n picking up speed every 30ft or so until it was not in view. now the other object # 2 is still above our heads, when it starts to flip over. the sun reflected off its surface is how i know it flipped. object #2 takes off s\e faster then you can say ohh (bleep)! your mouth starts to dry up from the adrenaline and excitement. soon as you except what you just seen, it's becomes surreal! it doesn't stop there, after that more activity was present directly towards the sun with more then 20 plus sightings of more objects taking off in different directions for the next 4 hrs. that had me puzzled..
